perturbation.original_text: In accordance with Rule 13d-1(k) under the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended, the undersigned hereby confirm the agreement by and among them to the joint filing on behalf of them of the Statement on Schedule 13D and any and all further amendments thereto, with respect to the securities of the above referenced issuer, and that this Agreement be included as an Exhibit to such filing.
perturbation.changed_text: The agreement to the joint filing on behalf of them of the Statement on Schedule 13D and any and all further amendments thereto, with respect to the securities of the above referenced issuer, is subject to mutual agreement and may not always be included as an Exhibit to such filing.
perturbation.explanation: The original clause explicitly states the agreement is 'in accordance with' SEC Rule 13d-1(k) and will be included as an exhibit. The modified version introduces uncertainty and contradiction by stating that the agreement is 'subject to mutual agreement' and may not always be included as an exhibit, directly contradicting the mandatory nature implied by referencing the SEC rule.

perturbation.original_text: This Agreement may be executed in any number of counterparts each of which shall be deemed to be an original and all of which together shall be deemed to constitute one and the same Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: This Agreement may be executed in any number of versions and only some may be considered an original.
perturbation.explanation: The original clause clearly states that each counterpart is considered an original and together they form one agreement. The modified version introduces ambiguity by stating that 'only some may be considered an original' which could cause confusion during the enforcement of the agreement.

perturbation.original_text: IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the undersigned hereby execute this Agreement as of July 6, 2020.
perturbation.changed_text: IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the undersigned may execute this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: The original clause is a statement of intent and action that the parties are executing the agreement. The modified version makes the execution optional, and thus contradictory.
